name: Money Miner
description:
You're hungry as heck and you need money to buy food, so you become a dirty dirty Miner. You find out that your boss requiring you to insert recently mined ores into this machine called W.I.R.E. because it makes people's jobs easier, so you do as you're asked. You still have to do work so it still sucks.

Wonderful
Intellectual
Rock
Eater


Platformer, as always!
Puzzle, I have no idea!
Pp, no.

Made by a dumb stupid head.
